title: Shape of the Graph
question_text:
One hundred randomly selected dog owners were asked, “Do you walk your dog every day?”
Compare the distribution of samples of size $100$ to samples of size $1{,}000$. We are told the distribution of sample size $100$ has a center of $0.38$.
For distribution of samples of size $n = 1000$, the graph would

choices.text: Look less normal and have less variability.
Have less variability and a center greater than $0.38$.
Have the same shape but a center greater than $0.38$.
Be less variable and have the same center.
Have the same variability but a center greater than $0.38$.
